abstract.description:
This document contains Higgs candidate events that pass the selections found in the example Higgs-to-four-lepton analysis of CMS public data.

These data were selected for use in education and outreach and contain a subset of the total event information. They are not suitable for a full physics analysis.

methodology.description: These events were selected in the example Higgs-to-four-lepton analysis of CMS public data.

title: Higgs candidate events from Run2012 selected in the Higgs-to-four-lepton analysis example

usage.description: Files with the extension .ig are JSON files containing information suitable for visual display. The data can be accessed from the file menu of the online event display. Comma-separated value (csv) files can be used in online applications such as the histogram visualizer and other applications, examples are given in

validation.description: These events were selected in the example Higgs-to-four-lepton analysis of CMS public data.
